20110112030033.000|20110112030035.000|CC1|WELL, NO ONE PUT UP MUCH OF A   
20110112030035.000|20110112030037.000|CC1|FIGHT, BUT IF CONGRESS CARED AS 
20110112030037.000|20110112030039.000|CC1|MUCH ABOUT CONTROLLING BULLETS  
20110112030039.000|20110112030042.000|CC1|AS IT CARES ABOUT CONTROLLING   
20110112030042.000|20110112030044.000|CC1|TAX RATES AND IT HAD EXTENDED   
20110112030044.000|20110112030047.000|CC1|THE ASSAULT WEAPONS BAN, JARED  
20110112030047.000|20110112030048.000|CC1|LOUGHNER WOULD HAVE NEEDED TO   
20110112030048.000|20110112030050.000|CC1|RELOAD AFTER FIRING HALF AS MANY
20110112030050.000|20110112030052.000|CC1|BULLETS AS HE DID.

20110112030052.000|20110112030054.000|CC1|IMAGINE THE AMOUNT OF GRIEF THAT
20110112030054.000|20110112030056.000|CC1|COULD HAVE BEEN SAVED IF 15 OF  
20110112030056.000|20110112030059.000|CC1|THOSE BULLETS WERE NEVER FIRED. 
20110112030059.000|20110112030100.000|CC1|WHEN THE INVESTIGATION REVEALS  
20110112030100.000|20110112030106.000|CC1|THE EXACT ORDER OF THE 31 SHOTS 
20110112030106.000|20110112030107.000|CC1|FIRED, WE'LL BE ABLE TO DO THE

20110112030116.000|20110112030118.000|CC1|THE REPUBLICAN PRESIDENT HAD THE
20110112030118.000|20110112030120.000|CC1|BASIC HUMAN DECENCY TO DO THE   
20110112030120.000|20110112030125.000|CC1|RIGHT THING IN 2004.

20110112030127.000|20110112030130.000|CC1|POINT IN AMERICAN POLITICAL     
20110112030130.000|20110112030130.000|CC1|CULTURE.

20110112030135.000|20110112030138.000|CC1|NEEDS MORE THAN TEN ROUND PER

20110112030142.000|20110112030143.000|CC1|TURNS TO GUNS.

20110112030153.000|20110112030153.000|CC1|ELSE.

20110112030349.000|20110112030353.000|CC1|THIS GOOD AND SHE DOES.

20110112030440.000|20110112030441.000|CC1|WE ARE SO VERY SORRY FOR THEIR  
20110112030441.000|20110112030442.000|CC1|LOSS.                           
20110112030442.000|20110112030444.000|CC1|THANK YOU.                      
20110112030444.000|20110112030446.000|CC1|TONIGHT THE ASSOCIATED PRESS IS 
20110112030446.000|20110112030447.000|CC1|REPORTING ON WHAT HAS BEEN FOUND
20110112030447.000|20110112030450.000|CC1|IN THE LOUGHNER HOME INCLUDING A
20110112030450.000|20110112030454.000|CC1|NOTE THAT SAID "DIE BITCH."     
20110112030454.000|20110112030455.000|CC1|INVESTIGATORS BELIEVE THE       
20110112030455.000|20110112030457.000|CC1|HANDWRITTEN MESSAGE WAS A       
20110112030457.000|20110112030458.000|CC1|REFERENCE TO CONGRESSWOMAN      
20110112030458.000|20110112030459.000|CC1|GIFFORDS.                       
20110112030459.000|20110112030500.000|CC1|IT WAS FOUND IN A SAFE ALONGSIDE
20110112030500.000|20110112030502.000|CC1|OTHER NOTES.                    
20110112030502.000|20110112030504.000|CC1|ONE SAID "I PLANNED AHEAD."     
20110112030504.000|20110112030506.000|CC1|ANOTHER SAID, "MY               
20110112030506.000|20110112030507.000|CC1|ASSASSINATION."                 
20110112030507.000|20110112030509.000|CC1|AND INCLUDED THE NAME GIFFORDS. 
20110112030509.000|20110112030510.000|CC1|THE ASSOCIATED PRESS IS ALSO    
20110112030510.000|20110112030511.000|CC1|REPORTING THAT ON THE MORNING OF
20110112030511.000|20110112030514.000|CC1|THE SHOOTING, JARED LOUGHNER'S  
20110112030514.000|20110112030516.000|CC1|FATHER SAW HIM TAKE A BLACK BAG 
20110112030516.000|20110112030518.000|CC1|OUT OF THE CAR TRUNK AND, WHEN  
20110112030518.000|20110112030520.000|CC1|HE APPROACHED HIS 22-YEAR-OLD   
20110112030520.000|20110112030522.000|CC1|SON, HE MUMBLED SOMETHING AND   
20110112030522.000|20110112030523.000|CC1|TOOK OFF RUNNING.               
20110112030523.000|20110112030525.000|CC1|THE ASSOCIATED PRESS QUOTING    
20110112030525.000|20110112030527.000|CC1|AUTHORITIES SAYS THE FATHER GOT 
20110112030527.000|20110112030530.000|CC1|IN HIS TRUCK AND CHASED HIS SON 
20110112030530.000|20110112030532.000|CC1|AS HIS SON RAN AWAY.            
20110112030532.000|20110112030534.000|CC1|JOINING ME NOW, A NEIGHBOR OF   
20110112030534.000|20110112030539.000|CC1|THE LOUGHNER FAMILY, GLORIA     
20110112030539.000|20110112030539.000|CC1|WADDILL.                        
20110112030539.000|20110112030541.000|CC1|DID YOU SEE ANY OF THAT ACTIVITY
20110112030541.000|20110112030543.000|CC1|SATURDAY MORNING THAT I JUST    
20110112030543.000|20110112030545.000|CC1|DESCRIBED, THE FATHER CHASING   
20110112030545.000|20110112030545.000|CC1|THE SON?                        
20110112030545.000|20110112030547.000|CC1|>> NO, I DID NOT SEE THAT.      
20110112030547.000|20110112030549.000|CC1|NOTHING LIKE THAT AT ALL.       
20110112030549.000|20110112030552.000|CC1|>> BUT IN LIVING NEARBY, YOU DID
20110112030552.000|20110112030553.000|CC1|HAVE SOME STRANGE EXPERIENCES   
20110112030553.000|20110112030555.000|CC1|WITH JARED, DIDN'T YOU?         
20110112030555.000|20110112030557.000|CC1|COULD YOU TELL US ABOUT THOSE.  
20110112030557.000|20110112030558.000|CC1|>> YES, I DID.                  
20110112030558.000|20110112030600.000|CC1|I HAD A COUPLE EXPERIENCES WHERE
20110112030600.000|20110112030603.000|CC1|HE WOULD COME OVER AND HE CAME  
20110112030603.000|20110112030605.000|CC1|AND WOULD BE STANDING THERE IN  
20110112030605.000|20110112030608.000|CC1|MY DRIVEWAY, STANDING BY MY     
20110112030608.000|20110112030611.000|CC1|WHITE CHEVY TRUCK, AND I HAD    
20110112030611.000|20110112030613.000|CC1|JUST COME HOME FROM WORK.       
20110112030613.000|20110112030614.000|CC1|I GOT OFF AT MIDNIGHT.          
20110112030614.000|20110112030617.000|CC1|AND I WOULD COME HOME.          
20110112030617.000|20110112030618.000|CC1|AND I WOULD NOTICE THAT HE WAS  
20110112030618.000|20110112030619.000|CC1|JUST STANDING THERE.            
20110112030619.000|20110112030623.000|CC1|AND I WOULD ASK HIM WHAT -- I   
20110112030623.000|20110112030624.000|CC1|DON'T THINK YOU WANT TO KNOW    
20110112030624.000|20110112030628.000|CC1|WHAT I WAS ASKING HIM, A        
20110112030628.000|20110112030629.000|CC1|FOUR-LETTER WORD WHY HE WAS     
20110112030629.000|20110112030631.000|CC1|STANDING IN MY DRIVEWAY.        
20110112030631.000|20110112030633.000|CC1|I WANTED TO KNOW WHY HAD WAS    
20110112030633.000|20110112030635.000|CC1|STANDING ON MY PROPERTY.        
20110112030635.000|20110112030637.000|CC1|HE WOULD NOT ANSWER ME.         
20110112030637.000|20110112030638.000|CC1|HE WOULD STAND THERE AND THEN HE
20110112030638.000|20110112030638.000|CC1|WOULD LEAVE.                    
20110112030638.000|20110112030640.000|CC1|>> WERE YOU AFRAID OF HIM,

20110112030640.000|20110112030642.000|CC1|>> I WASN'T AFRAID OF HIM

20110112030643.000|20110112030647.000|CC1|ARMED WHEN I COME HOME.         
20110112030647.000|20110112030650.000|CC1|>> AND WHEN YOU HEARD THE NEWS  
20110112030650.000|20110112030652.000|CC1|THAT JARED WAS INVOLVED IN THIS 
20110112030652.000|20110112030654.000|CC1|SHOOTING, WHAT DID YOU FEEL?    
20110112030654.000|20110112030657.000|CC1|HOW MUCH SURPRISE DID YOU FEEL  
20110112030657.000|20110112030658.000|CC1|ABOUT THAT?                     
20110112030658.000|20110112030659.000|CC1|>> IT DID SURPRISE ME.          
20110112030659.000|20110112030700.000|CC1|IT SURPRISED ME THAT SOMEBODY   
20110112030700.000|20110112030702.000|CC1|COULD GO AND DO SOMETHING LIKE  
20110112030702.000|20110112030704.000|CC1|THIS TO SO MANY INNOCENT PEOPLE.
20110112030704.000|20110112030706.000|CC1|AND RIGHT NOW THE WHOLE         
20110112030706.000|20110112030707.000|CC1|COMMUNITY IS HURTING.           
20110112030707.000|20110112030711.000|CC1|WE'RE ALL HURTING FOR WHAT HE   
20110112030711.000|20110112030711.000|CC1|DID.                            
20110112030711.000|20110112030714.000|CC1|>> AND DO YOU KNOW HIS PARENTS? 
20110112030714.000|20110112030716.000|CC1|>> I DON'T KNOW HIS PARENTS, BUT
20110112030716.000|20110112030718.000|CC1|I WENT BY THERE TODAY TO SEE IF 
20110112030718.000|20110112030721.000|CC1|I COULD BUY SOME GROCERIES FOR  
20110112030721.000|20110112030721.000|CC1|THEM.                           
20110112030721.000|20110112030722.000|CC1|I UNDERSTAND THEY HAVEN'T BEEN  
20110112030722.000|20110112030723.000|CC1|ABLE TO LEAVE THE HOUSE BECAUSE 
20110112030723.000|20110112030725.000|CC1|THEY'RE SURROUNDED BY THE MEDIA.
20110112030725.000|20110112030727.000|CC1|AND I JUST FELT BAD FOR THEM    
20110112030727.000|20110112030730.000|CC1|BECAUSE THEY HAD NOTHING TO DO  
20110112030730.000|20110112030730.000|CC1|WITH THIS.                      
20110112030730.000|20110112030731.000|CC1|>> DID YOU HAVE ANY             
20110112030731.000|20110112030732.000|CC1|COMMUNICATION WITH THEM?

20110112034546.000|20110112034549.000|CC1|    on the wings of Lunesta.    
20110112034549.000|20110112034549.000|CC1|  Lunesta helps you fall asleep 
20110112034549.000|20110112034552.000|CC1|        and stay asleep,        
20110112034552.000|20110112034552.000|CC1|           so you can           
20110112034552.000|20110112034555.000|CC1|     wake up feeling rested.    
20110112034555.000|20110112034555.000|CC1|When taking Lunesta, don't drive
20110112034555.000|20110112034558.000|CC1|      or operate machinery      
20110112034558.000|20110112034600.000|CC1|   until you feel fully awake.  
20110112034600.000|20110112034600.000|CC1|    Walking, eating, driving,   
20110112034600.000|20110112034602.000|CC1| or engaging in other activities
20110112034602.000|20110112034602.000|CC1|      while asleep, without     
20110112034602.000|20110112034605.000|CC1|  remembering it the next day,  
20110112034605.000|20110112034606.000|CC1|       have been reported.      
20110112034606.000|20110112034606.000|CC1| Abnormal behaviors may include 
20110112034606.000|20110112034609.000|CC1|   aggressiveness, agitation,   
20110112034609.000|20110112034611.000|CC1|  hallucinations or confusion.  
20110112034611.000|20110112034611.000|CC1|     In depressed patients,     
20110112034611.000|20110112034613.000|CC1|    worsening of depression,    
20110112034613.000|20110112034613.000|CC1|   including risk of suicide,   
20110112034613.000|20110112034615.000|CC1|           may occur.           
20110112034615.000|20110112034615.000|CC1|           Alcohol may          
20110112034615.000|20110112034617.000|CC1|      increase these risks.     
20110112034617.000|20110112034617.000|CC1|    Allergic reactions, such    
20110112034617.000|20110112034619.000|CC1|  as tongue or throat swelling, 
20110112034619.000|20110112034621.000|CC1| occur rarely and may be fatal. 
20110112034621.000|20110112034621.000|CC1|    Side effects may include    
20110112034621.000|20110112034623.000|CC1|   unpleasant taste, headache,  
20110112034623.000|20110112034623.000|CC1|            dizziness           
20110112034623.000|20110112034625.000|CC1|     and morning drowsiness.    
20110112034625.000|20110112034625.000|CC1|   Ask your doctor if Lunesta
